Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

[i]Join Forces [/i]— Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana.
Each opponent creates X 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact tokens with Assault, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way plus 1. [i](Creatures with Assault must attack if able and attacks you if able.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if each opponent does not control a creature named B1-Battledroid, exile The Clone Wars from your graveyard, then cast it transformed.

While voting, any number of target players may vote an additional time.
Whenever a vote finishes, if the outcome you voted for succeeds, you and each player who voted for that outcome draw a card.

[i]Senate Corruption[/i]— Whenever an opponent willingly chooses to vote the same way as you, both players draw a card and you put a Corruption counter on Palpatine, Supreme Chancelor.
When votes are revealed, you may remove any number of Corruption counters from Palpatine, Supreme Chancelor. Each time you do, replace target player's vote with one of yours.

While voting, you get an additional vote. 
Whenever players finish voting, each player who voted for your choice gains 2 life.

Intimidate [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]
While voting, each opponent may pay {1}. If they don't, you choose how that player votes votes this turn.

When All Terrain Reconnaissance Transport enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand unless they pay {1}.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Tap enchanted creature and put a stun counter on it. 
At the beginning of each end step, if enchanted creature is tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
Deal 3 damage any target, 2 damage to another, and 1 damage to another. [i](Each must have a different target)[/i]

[i]Secret council[/i] — When Bail Organa, Alderaan Delegate enters the battlefield, each player secretly votes for a player, then those votes are revealed. Each player draws a card for each vote they received. Then, the player with the most votes becomes the monarch.

[i]Will of the Senate[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for war or for peace. If war gets more votes, each creature your opponents control become goaded. If peace gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

[i]Council's Dilemma[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for deregulation or regulation. Each opponent sacrifices a land and creates a treasure token for each deregulation vote and discards a card for each regulation vote.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“More troops are needed. The Republic cannot afford to let the Separatists gain any more ground!” —Senator Gume Saam[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Secret council[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for war or peace. Create a 2/2 white Clone-Trooper soldier creature token for each war vote. Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle for each peace vote.

[i]Will of the Senate[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for increased or decreased military expenditure. If increased gets more votes, you may put a creature card with mana value 4 or less from your hand onto the battlefield. If decreased gets more votes, each player sacrifices a non-token creature.

Haste, Trample
When IG-227 Hailfire-Class Droid Tank deals combat damage to a player, untap it. There is an additional combat phase. 
IG-227 Hailfire-Class Droid Tank can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature with a keyword counter is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, put a counter of that type on target creature you control.
Robots in your hand have: “Squad {2}” [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Unattach an Equipment from target equipped creature you control. It deals damage equal to the Equipment's mana value to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

Reach
Squad: Exile a card from your graveyard. [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile any number of cards from your graveyard. When this creature enters, create that many token copies of it.)[/i]
When DSD1-Dwarf Spider Droid enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.card_name: A Fine Addition to My Collection
cards.rules_text:
Gravestorm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn.)[/i]
Reveal the top card of your library until you reveal an equipment card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn. Put that card in your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Menace
When Maul, Formerly Darth enters the battlefield or attacks, goad all legendary creatures. [i](Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)[/i]
Whenever a creature is goaded, put a +1/+1 counter on Maul, Formerly Darth.

Flying, Haste
When Gar Saxon, Super Commando enters the battlefield, reveal an enchantment aura or artifact equipment card from your hand and note its name, then put all named cards from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield attached to Gar Saxon, Super Commando.

Flying, Prowess
Whenever Bo Katan Kryze, Terrorist deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a non-creature spell from your graveyard with mana values less than the damage dealt.

When ARC-5597, Jesse enters the battlefield, target opponent creates two 1/1 Battle-droid colorless artifact creature tokens.
Whenever an artifact creature token you don't control dies, draw a card.

Trample
Whenever a modified creature you control attacks, exile the top card of target player's library. You may play that card this turn without paying its mana cost. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Trample
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Menace
You can't spend mana to cast this spell.
Convoke, Delve [i](Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana that creature's color. Each color you exile from your graveyard pays for {1}.)[/i]
When The Son, Bogan enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of target creature that player controls. Put a menace counter on them.

Lifelink
You can't spend mana to cast this spell.
Convoke, Delve [i](Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana that creature's color. Each color you exile from your graveyard pays for 1.)[/i]
When The Daughter, Ashla enters the battlefield, for each opponent, return up to one target historic card from each player's graveyard to the battlefield under your control. Put a lifelink counter on them.

Vigilance
You can't spend mana to cast this spell.
Convoke, Delve [i](Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 or one mana that creature's color. Each color you exile from your graveyard pays for 1.)[/i]
When The Father, Bendu enters the battlefield, for each opponent, detain up to one target creature that player controls.
While voting, players may choose to abstain instead of casting a vote. Whenever a player does, both you and the abstaining player draw a card and gain 1 life.

Reach
Whenever Octuptarra Magna Tri-Droid enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Trench, Naval Commander enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact vehicle card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If it has a mana value of 3 or less, you may cast without paying its mana until the end of turn.
Choose a creature you control. For each keyword ability that creature controls, put a keyword counter of that type on each other creature you control.

Choose one or more, for each time you do, reduce X by 1, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast this spell —
• Surveil X, then draw a card.
• Target opponent discards X cards.
• Deal X damage to any target.

The next time target spell or permanent would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, Deflect Attacks deals that much damage to target creature you don't control.
Return target spell or permanent to the top of its owner's library. Its controller may have you draw a card. If they do, they also draw a card.
Target spell or permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice. Draw a card.

Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Hexproof 
[i]Survivor[/i] — At the beginning of your second main phase, if CT-9415, Hardcase is tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If there are three or more +1/+1 counters on CT-9415, Hardcase, you may put a keyword counter on it instead.

Put a shield counter on creatures you control. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
Draw a card.

At the beginning of your end step, you may exile a creature card from your hand face up. For as long as it remain in exile, it gains “Squad {2}” [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When Phase I Clone-Trooper enters the battlefield, if you control another Phase I Clone-Trooper, put a vigilance counter on this creature.

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Whenever Phase II Clone-Trooper or a creature that shares the same name as it attacks, it gains +1/0 until the end of combat.

Enchanted creature can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, both you and its controller gain 2 life.

Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature until end of turn.
Draw a card.
Untap target creature and gain control of it until it attacks or blocks.

When Hologram enters the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 Illusion copy of target creature you control with “When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.” If you do, Hologram enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Target artifact creature you control with flying deals damage equal to its power to each creature you don't control.
Exile target graveyard. Put each creature card with mana value X or less exiled this way onto the battlefield under your control with a finality counter on it.

When Mother Talzin enters the battlefield, target creature Monstrosities X, where X is equal to the difference between Mother Talzin's and its mana value.
Whenever a creature becomes monstrous, you may have target opponent gain control of it. Put a keyword counter of your choice on it and it's goaded for the rest of the game.

First strike
[i]Dueling[/i] — Whenever Dooku, Count of Serenno deals combat damage to a creature, you may look at the top card of your library and reveal it. If you reveal an instant or sorcery this way, you may cast it until the end of combat.
Apprentice [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Each opponent reveals the highest mana value card in their hand.
Draw a card.

Affinity for basic forests [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic forest you control.)[/i]
{T}: Add {G}{G}.

Affinity for basic islands [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic island you control.)[/i]
{T}: Add {U}{U}.

Affinity for basic plains [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic plain you control.)[/i]
{T}: Add {W}{W}.

Affinity for basic swamps [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic swamp you control.)[/i]
{T}: Add {B}{B}.

Affinity for basic mountains [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic mountain you control.)[/i]
{T}: Add {R}{R}.

Flash, Double strike
When Ahsoka Tano, Jedi Ronin enters the battlefield, it gains indestructible until end of turn.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flying
{U}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Arquitens-Class Light Cruiser.
{W}: Gain hexproof until end of turn.
Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Flying, First strike
When Recusant-Class Light Destroyer enters the battlefield or attacks, destroy target creature or artifact. If you do, draw a card and discard a card.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

[i]Council's dilemma[/i] — Choose a creature you don't control. Starting with you, each player votes for guilty or innocent. If innocent gets more votes, gain control of it. If guilty gets more votes, exile it.

Survivor — At the beginning of your second main phase, if F, Jedi Fugitive is tapped, draw a card.
{1}{W}, {T}: Target creature you control gains protection from another target creature.
Apprentice [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash
When The Ronin enters the battlefield, it gains double strike until your next end step if its not your turn.

Choose one or more, for each time you do, reduce X by 1, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast this spell — 
• Exile target creature with mana value X or less.
• Scry X, then draw a card.
• Tap up to X target creatures.

When Wat Tambor, Pillager enters the battlefield, create X 0/1 green Twi'lek Hostage creature tokens with “This creature can't attack.” Where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Wat Tambor, Pillager. 
Whenever a source an opponent controls kills a Twi'lek Hostage, that opponent sacrifices a land.
Twi'lek Captive can't attack.

Squad {3} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {3} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When TK Trooper enters the battlefield, draw a card for each other creature you control named TK Trooper.

{1}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Jedi Holocron: Reveal the top 6 cards of your library, then put one into your hand. 
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Sith Holocron: Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Target opponent does the same. 
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Coruscant enters the battlefield tapped.
While voting, you may vote an additional time.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{5}, {T}: Tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. This ability costs {1} less for each snow permanent you control.

{T}, Pay 2 life: Add one mana of any color. 
Sacrifice a Desert, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.

Menace, Lifelink
When Durge, The Unkillable dies, put it onto the battlefield with X -1/-1 counters where X is the number of -1/-1 counters on it when it died plus 1.

Exile two cards from your hand face down. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain in exile. When you cast one of them, you may cast the other. If you do, pay life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

Defender, Flying
If you would create one or more artifact creature tokens, create that many plus one more.
Whenever an artifact creature token enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Defender
Whenever a non-token creature dies, exile it instead and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Its a black Zombie token in addition to its other colors and types.

When Barriss Offee, Fallen Jedi enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
{3}, {T}: Barriss Offee, Fallen Jedi fights target creature her controller controls. Only Barriss Offee, Fallen Jedi's owner may activate this ability.

Defender
When Corrupt Senator enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
Whenever players finish voting, any opponent may have you draw a card. If they do, your vote is not counted.

Defender
Whenever players finish voting, each player who voted for a choice you voted for may put a basic land from their library onto the battlefield tapped.

Defender
Whenever players finish voting, each player who voted for a choice you voted for puts two +1/+1 counters on target creature they control.

Defender
When Corrupt Senator enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
Whenever players finish voting, any opponent may have you create a treasure token. If they do, your vote is not counted.

Defender
Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 3 life.

Flash, First strike
When Tusken Raiders enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

Piloting {3}{G} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
Enchanted vehicle deals double damage.

First strike
When Clone Heavy Gunner enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls for as long as Clone Heavy Gunner remains on the battlefield.

When NR-N99 Persuader-Class Droid enters the battlefield, create 3 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact creature tokens.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehcile becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Piloting {1}{G} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature and has trample.

Umbaran Millicreep Droid can't attack or block.
When Umbaran Millicreep Droid enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it. 
At the beginning of your upkeep, Umbaran Millicreep Droid deals 1 damage to each other creature you control.

Trample
B3-Super Battledroid can't be blocked unless all creatures defending player controls block it.
Whenever B3-Super Battledroid attacks, destroy target artifact.

First strike
Droideka-Marksman reduces the first instance of damage it takes each turn to 0.

SD-K4 Assassin Droid can't attack or block.
When SD-K4 Assassin Droid enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of it.
{T}: SD-K4 Assassin Droid fights target creature under its controller's ownership. Only SD-K4 Assassin Droid's owner may activate this ability.

Hexproof
Each instant and sorcery card in your hand has miracle. Its miracle cost is equal to its mana value reduced by {4}. [i](You may cast a card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you draw this turn.)[/i]
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

When Biker Advanced Recon Commando enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature.
Equipped creature has haste and +1/+0.
When equipped creature is put into the graveyard, sacrifice Single Trooper Ariel Platform and draw a card.
Equip {1}

Whenever equipped creature attacks, it gains “Saddle 1: Equipped creature gains all keyword abilities of all creatures saddling it until end of turn.” [i](Tap any number of other creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Mount becomes saddled until end of turn. Saddle only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Equip {2}
Each land is an Island in addition to its other types.
When Black Sun Foot Soldier enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If its a creature card, you may pay 1 life to repeat this process again.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose two creatures. Create a copy of both.

Flying
Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

Piloting {1}{R} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Piloted vehicle is a creature.
When enchanted vehicle deals combat damage to a player, you may look at the top 3 cards of your library and exile one of them. You may cast that card until the end of turn.

Target creature takes double damage during each combat phase until end of turn. 
Draw a card.

Piloting {3} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
Whenever enchanted vehicle attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

Flying, First strike
When Jango Fett, Bounty Hunter enters the battlefield or attacks, put a bounty counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature with a bounty counter dies, you may search your library for a card with mana value less than or equal to the creature's power, reveal it, then shuffle.

Piloting {3}{W} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
Enchanted vehicle has first strike if a creature you control has first strike. The same is true for flying, deathtouch, double strike, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, skulk, trample, and vigilance.

Put an oil counter on up to two target creatures. Until end of turn, whenever a creature with an oil counter receives damage from a source without an oil counter on it, deal that much damage to each other creature with an oil counter on it.

Piloting {2}{G} [i](If you cast this card for its piloting cost, it's an Aura enchantment spell with enchant vehicle. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached.)[/i]
Enchanted vehicle is a creature.
Whenever enchanted vehicle deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library. If its a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
When Pyke Syndicate Goon enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
When Jawa Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, create X junk tokens and X treasure tokens, where X is equal to half the mana value of the sacrificed artifact.

Whenever you sacrifice a non-token artifact, create a junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Destroy target artifact. Create X junk tokens where X is the mana value of the destroyed artifact. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Menace, Trample
Delve, Affinity for junk tokens [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each junk token you control.)[/i]
When Dianoga enters the battlefield

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Create a junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Affinity for junk tokens [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each junk token you control.)[/i]
When Lotho Minor Fire-Breather enters the battlefield, deal X damage where X is the number of artifacts you control.

When Lotho Minor Junker enters the battlefield, if one or more artifacts left the battlefield this turn, create that many junk tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Deathtouch
When Ig-88B, Armed and Dangerous enters the battlefield or attacks, put a bounty counter on target creature.
Whenever a creature with a bounty counter dies, put a bounty counter on another target creature, then draw a card.

Morley, Servant of Maul can't attack or block.
Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent of your choice chooses one of them to put into your hand and the other to exile.
When Ziro the Hutt, Crime Boss enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of target land that player controls. Then, each opponent creates a treasure token.
